# Research Notes

Markdown supports footnotes[^1] for references and citations.

The syntax was popularized by PHP Markdown Extra[^2].

## Definition Lists

Term One
:   The first definition.
:   An alternate definition.

Term Two
:   The second definition with `inline code`.

## Combined

According to the specification[^3], definition lists and footnotes
can coexist in a single document.

[^1]: This is the first footnote.
[^2]: See the PHP Markdown Extra documentation.
[^3]: CommonMark extensions specification.
